text: @JoeBiden @joncoopertweets Wartime president? Since when? When did he actually start a war against the Coronavirus? He took halfassed steps to try and make himself look good. That is all he did. He failed in his one priority. His only priority! Taking care of America and her people. He massively FAILED!
